visual_description_swarm: hundreds of {nightmarish/grotesque/monsterous/giant/enormous/massive} {centipedes/insects/cockroaches/worms/slugs/maggots}, {acting in coordination/behaving like a unified mind/acting as one/moving in unison}
attacks_with_swarm: blunt force trauma, battering its {enemies/prey/target} with ever-changing {appendages/tendrils/limbs/tentacles}
acid, {secreted from somewhere inside itself/oozing from every gap in its form}
sheer volume and weight, suffocating its enemies
